original_text: The Lord hath accomplished his fury; he hath poured out his fierce anger, and hath kindled a fire in Zion, and it hath devoured the foundations thereof.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 분을 내시며 그의 맹렬한 진노를 쏟으심이여 시온에 불을 지르사 그 터를 사르셨도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord hath accomplished his fury
he hath poured out his fierce anger
and hath kindled a fire in Zion
and it hath devoured the foundations thereof
